long_description: Durable cockpit cover is perfect for keeping water, leaves and unwanted critters out of your tandem's cockpit during storage and transport. Tough polyurethane-coated nylon material provides long-lasting service and protection. Strong bungee-powered rim grip system secures cover firmly to cockpit coaming. Front webbing grab loop assists in installation and removal. Two webbing loops with nylon webbing strap and side-release buckle wraps around hull for extra security during transport.
short_description: Durable cockpit cover is perfect for keeping water, leaves and unwanted critters out of your tandem's cockpit during storage and transport.
